success.description: If the response is successful or not

due_date.description: The due date of the activity. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

due_time.description: The due time of the activity in UTC. Format: HH:MM

duration.description: The duration of the activity. Format: HH:MM

deal_id.description: The ID of the deal this activity is associated with

person_id.description: The ID of the person this activity is associated with

org_id.description: The ID of the organization this activity is associated with

note.description: The note of the activity (HTML format)

location.description: The address of the activity. Pipedrive will automatically check if the location matches a geo-location on Google maps.

public_description.description: Additional details about the activity that is synced to your external calendar. Unlike the note added to the activity, the description is publicly visible to any guests added to the activity.

id.description: The activity ID, generated when the activity was created

done.description: Whether the activity is done or not

type.description: The type of the activity. This is in correlation with the `key_string` parameter of ActivityTypes.

user_id.description: The ID of the user whom the activity is assigned to

participants.description: List of multiple persons (participants) this activity is associated with

busy_flag.description: Marks if the activity is set as 'Busy' or 'Free'. If the flag is set to `true`, your customers will not be able to book that time slot through any Scheduler links. The flag can also be unset. When the value of the flag is unset (`null`), the flag defaults to 'Busy' if it has a time set, and 'Free' if it is an all-day event without specified time.

attendees.description: The attendees of the activity. This can be either your existing Pipedrive contacts or an external email address.

reference_type.description: If the activity references some other object, it is indicated here. For example, value `Salesphone` refers to activities created with Caller.

reference_id.description: Together with the `reference_type`, gives the ID of the other object

conference_meeting_client.description: The ID of Marketplace app, which is connected to this activity

conference_meeting_url.description: The link to join the meeting which is associated with this activity

conference_meeting_id.description: The meeting ID of the meeting provider (Zoom, MS Teams etc.) that is associated with this activity

add_time.description: The creation date and time of the activity in UTC. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

marked_as_done_time.description: The date and time this activity was marked as done. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

last_notification_time.description: The date and time of latest notifications sent about this activity to the participants or the attendees of this activity

last_notification_user_id.description: The ID of the user who triggered the sending of the latest notifications about this activity to the participants or the attendees of this activity

notification_language_id.description: The ID of the language the notifications are sent in

lead_id.description: The ID of the lead in the UUID format this activity is associated with

active_flag.description: Whether the activity is active or not

update_time.description: The last update date and time of the activity. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

update_user_id.description: The ID of the user who was the last to update this activity

gcal_event_id.description: For the activity which syncs to Google calendar, this is the Google event ID. NB! This field is related to old Google calendar sync and will be deprecated soon.

google_calendar_id.description: The Google calendar ID that this activity syncs to. NB! This field is related to old Google calendar sync and will be deprecated soon.

google_calendar_etag.description: The Google calendar API etag (version) that is used for syncing this activity. NB! This field is related to old Google calendar sync and will be deprecated soon.

calendar_sync_include_context.description: For activities that sync to an external calendar, this setting indicates if the activity syncs with context (what are the deals, persons, organizations this activity is related to)

source_timezone.description: The timezone the activity was created in an external calendar

rec_rule.description: The rule for the recurrence of the activity. Is important for activities synced into Pipedrive from an external calendar. Example: "RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=WE"

rec_rule_extension.description: Additional rules for the recurrence of the activity, extend the `rec_rule`. Is important for activities synced into Pipedrive from an external calendar.

rec_master_activity_id.description: The ID of parent activity for a recurrent activity if the current activity is an exception to recurrence rules

series.description: The list of recurring activity instances. It is in a structure as follows: `[{due_date: "2020-06-24", due_time: "10:00:00"}]`

created_by_user_id.description: The ID of the user who created the activity

location_subpremise.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates apartment/suite number.

location_street_number.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates house number.

location_route.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates street name.

location_sublocality.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates district/sublocality.

location_locality.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates city/town/village/locality.

location_admin_area_level_1.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates state/county.

location_admin_area_level_2.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates region.

location_country.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates country.

location_postal_code.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates ZIP/postal code.

location_formatted_address.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates full/combined address.

location_lat.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates latitude.

location_long.description: Subfield of location field. Indicates longitude.

org_name.description: The name of the organization this activity is associated with

person_name.description: The name of the person this activity is associated with

deal_title.description: The name of the deal this activity is associated with

owner_name.description: The name of the user this activity is owned by

person_dropbox_bcc.description: The BCC email address of the person

deal_dropbox_bcc.description: The BCC email address of the deal

assigned_to_user_id.description: The ID of the user to whom the activity is assigned to. Equal to `user_id`.

file.description: The file that is attached to this activity. For example, this can be a reference to an audio note file generated with Pipedrive mobile app.

id.description: The ID of the activity type

name.description: The name of the activity type

icon_key.description: Icon graphic to use for representing this activity type

color.description: A designated color for the activity type in 6-character HEX format (e.g. `FFFFFF` for white, `000000` for black)

order_nr.description: An order number for the activity type. Order numbers should be used to order the types in the activity type selections.

key_string.description: A string that is generated by the API based on the given name of the activity type upon creation

active_flag.description: The active flag of the activity type

is_custom_flag.description: Whether the activity type is a custom one or not

add_time.description: The creation time of the activity type

update_time.description: The update time of the activity type

creator_user_id.description: The ID of the deal creator

person_id.description: The ID of the person associated with the deal

org_id.description: The ID of the organization associated with the deal

stage_id.description: The ID of the deal stage

currency.description: The currency associated with the deal

add_time.description: The creation date and time of the deal

update_time.description: The last updated date and time of the deal

stage_change_time.description: The last updated date and time of the deal stage

active.description: Whether the deal is active or not

deleted.description: Whether the deal is deleted or not

probability.description: The success probability percentage of the deal

next_activity_date.description: The date of the next activity associated with the deal

next_activity_time.description: The time of the next activity associated with the deal

next_activity_id.description: The ID of the next activity associated with the deal

last_activity_id.description: The ID of the last activity associated with the deal

last_activity_date.description: The date of the last activity associated with the deal

lost_reason.description: The reason for losing the deal

close_time.description: The date and time of closing the deal

pipeline_id.description: The ID of pipeline associated with the deal

won_time.description: The date and time of changing the deal status as won

first_won_time.description: The date and time of the first time changing the deal status as won

lost_time.description: The date and time of changing the deal status as lost

products_count.description: The number of products associated with the deal

files_count.description: The number of files associated with the deal

notes_count.description: The number of notes associated with the deal

followers_count.description: The number of followers associated with the deal

email_messages_count.description: The number of emails associated with the deal

activities_count.description: The number of activities associated with the deal

done_activities_count.description: The number of completed activities associated with the deal

undone_activities_count.description: The number of incomplete activities associated with the deal

participants_count.description: The number of participants associated with the deal

expected_close_date.description: The expected close date of the deal

last_incoming_mail_time.description: The date and time of the last incoming email associated with the deal

last_outgoing_mail_time.description: The date and time of the last outgoing email associated with the deal

label.description: The label assigned to the deal

stage_order_nr.description: The order number of the deal stage associated with the deal

person_name.description: The name of the person associated with the deal

org_name.description: The name of the organization associated with the deal

next_activity_subject.description: The subject of the next activity associated with the deal

next_activity_type.description: The type of the next activity associated with the deal

next_activity_duration.description: The duration of the next activity associated with the deal

next_activity_note.description: The note of the next activity associated with the deal

formatted_value.description: The deal value formatted with selected currency. E.g. US$500

weighted_value.description: Probability times deal value. Probability can either be deal probability or if not set, then stage probability.

formatted_weighted_value.description: The weighted_value formatted with selected currency. E.g. US$500

weighted_value_currency.description: The currency associated with the deal

rotten_time.description: The date and time of changing the deal status as rotten

owner_name.description: The name of the deal owner

cc_email.description: The BCC email of the deal

org_hidden.description: If the organization that is associated with the deal is hidden or not

person_hidden.description: If the person that is associated with the deal is hidden or not

user_id.description: The ID of the user to associate the file with

deal_id.description: The ID of the deal to associate the file with

person_id.description: The ID of the person to associate the file with

org_id.description: The ID of the organization to associate the file with

product_id.description: The ID of the product to associate the file with

activity_id.description: The ID of the activity to associate the file with

add_time.description: The date and time when the file was added/created. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

update_time.description: The last updated date and time of the file. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

file_name.description: The original name of the file

active_flag.description: Whether the user is active or not. false = Not activated, true = Activated

inline_flag.description: Whether the file was uploaded as inline or not

remote_location.description: The location type to send the file to. Only googledrive is supported at the moment.

remote_id.description: The ID of the remote item

cid.description: The ID of the inline attachment

s3_bucket.description: The location of the cloud storage

mail_message_id.description: The ID of the mail message to associate the file with

mail_template_id.description: The ID of the mail template to associate the file with

deal_name.description: The name of the deal associated with the dile

person_name.description: The name of the person associated with the file

org_name.description: The name of the organization associated with the file

product_name.description: The name of the product associated with the file

url.description: The URL of the download file

name.description: The visible name of the file

active_flag.description: The active flag of the filter

add_time.description: The date and time when the filter was added

update_time.description: The date and time when the filter was updated

visible_to.description: The visibility group ID of who can see then filter

active_flag.description: Whether the note is active or deleted

add_time.description: The creation date and time of the note

content.description: The content of the note in HTML format. Subject to sanitization on the back-end.

deal.description: The deal this note is attached to

title.description: The title of the deal this note is attached to

lead_id.description: The ID of the lead the note is attached to

deal_id.description: The ID of the deal the note is attached to

last_update_user_id.description: The ID of the user who last updated the note

org_id.description: The ID of the organization the note is attached to

organization.description: The organization the note is attached to

name.description: The name of the organization the note is attached to

person.description: The person the note is attached to

name.description: The name of the person the note is attached to

person_id.description: The ID of the person the note is attached to

pinned_to_deal_flag.description: If true, the results are filtered by note to deal pinning state

pinned_to_organization_flag.description: If true, the results are filtered by note to organization pinning state

pinned_to_person_flag.description: If true, the results are filtered by note to person pinning state

update_time.description: The last updated date and time of the note

user.description: The user who created the note

email.description: The email of the note creator

icon_url.description: The URL of the note creator avatar picture

is_you.description: Whether the note is created by you or not

name.description: The name of the note creator

user_id.description: The ID of the note creator

company_id.description: The ID of the company related to the person

active_flag.description: Whether the person is active or not

phone.description: List of phone data related to the person

primary.description: Boolean that indicates if phone number is primary for the person or not

label.description: The label that indicates the type of the phone number. (Possible values - work, home, mobile or other)

email.description: List of email data related to the person

primary.description: Boolean that indicates if email is primary for the person or not

label.description: The label that indicates the type of the email. (Possible values - work, home or other)

first_char.description: The first letter of the name of the person

add_time.description: The date and time when the person was added/created. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

update_time.description: The last updated date and time of the person. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

visible_to.description: The visibility group ID of who can see the person

id.description: The ID of the picture associated with the item

item_type.description: The type of item the picture is related to

active_flag.description: Whether the associated picture is active or not

add_time.description: The add time of the picture

update_time.description: The update time of the picture

merge_what_id.description: The ID of the person with what the main person was merged

first_name.description: The first name of the person

last_name.description: The last name of the person

email_messages_count.description: The count of email messages related to the person

activities_count.description: The count of activities related to the person

last_outgoing_mail_time.description: The date and time of the last outgoing email associated with the person

related_open_deals_count.description: The count of related open deals related with the item

participant_closed_deals_count.description: The count of closed participant deals related with the item

company_id.description: The ID of the company related to the organization

has_pic.description: Whether the user has picture or not. 0 = No picture, 1 = Has picture.

Whether the organization is active or not

address_route.description: The route of the organization location

open_deals_count.description: The count of open deals related with the item

related_open_deals_count.description: The count of related open deals related with the item

closed_deals_count.description: The count of closed deals related with the item

related_closed_deals_count.description: The count of related closed deals related with the item

next_activity_date.description: The date of the next activity associated with the deal

next_activity_time.description: The time of the next activity associated with the deal

next_activity_id.description: The ID of the next activity associated with the deal

last_activity_id.description: The ID of the last activity associated with the deal

last_activity_date.description: The date of the last activity associated with the deal

url_title.description: The pipeline title displayed in the URL

order_nr.description: Defines the order of pipelines. First order (`order_nr=0`) is the default pipeline.

active.description: Whether this pipeline will be made inactive (hidden) or active

deal_probability.description: Whether deal probability is disabled or enabled for this pipeline

add_time.description: The pipeline creation time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

update_time.description: The pipeline update time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

unit.description: The unit in which this product is sold

active_flag.description: Whether this product will be made active or not

selectable.description: Whether this product can be selected in deals or not

first_char.description: The first letter of the product name

visible_to.description: The visibility of the product. If omitted, the visibility will be set to the default visibility setting of this item type for the authorized user.

owner_id.description: The ID of the user who will be marked as the owner of this product. When omitted, authorized user ID will be used.

add_time.description: The date and time when the product was added to the deal

update_time.description: The date and time when the product was updated to the deal

prices.description: Array of objects, each containing: `currency` (string), `price` (number), `cost` (number, optional), `overhead_cost` (number, optional). Note that there can only be one price per product per currency. When `prices` is omitted altogether, no prices will be set up for the product.

order_nr.description: Defines the order of the stage

active_flag.description: Whether the stage is active or deleted

deal_probability.description: The success probability percentage of the deal. Used/shown when the deal weighted values are used.

pipeline_id.description: The ID of the pipeline to add the stage to

rotten_flag.description: Whether deals in this stage can become rotten

rotten_days.description: The number of days the deals not updated in this stage would become rotten. Applies only if the `rotten_flag` is set.

add_time.description: The stage creation time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

update_time.description: The stage update time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

activated.description: Boolean that indicates whether the user is activated

last_login.description: The last login date and time of the user. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

created.description: The creation date and time of the user. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

modified.description: The last modification date and time of the user. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

signup_flow_variation.description: The variation of signup flow (if exists). E.g. google

has_created_company.description: Boolean that indicates whether the user has created a company

is_admin.description: Indication if the user is admin (1 = true, 0 = false)

active_flag.description: Boolean that indicates whether the user is activated

role_id.description: The ID of the user role

is_you.description: Boolean that indicates if the requested user is the same which is logged in (in this case, always true)

since_timestamp.description: The timestamp in UTC. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

last_timestamp_on_page.description: The timestamp in UTC. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

pagination.description: The additional data of the list

more_items_in_collection.description: If there are more list items in the collection than displayed or not
